document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cymindis ( Cymindis ) adusta L.Redtenfoacher, 1843 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kabak, 2003
).

= imperialis
Zoubkoff, 1837
Citations: Dizin mts, 3000-3500 m (Prov. of Mazandaran; Morvan, 1975 ).

Cymindis ( Cymindis ) decora Fischer
von Waldheim, 1829

Cymindis ( Cymindis ) etrusca substricta Morvan, 1975 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kabak, 2003
).

Cymindis ( Cymindis ) lineata
(Quensel in Schonherr, 1806 )

=
dorsalis (Fischer, 1820 )
Citations: Dasht-e Arjan (Prov. of Fars ; Mandl, 1973 ).
Studied material: Mahan, 2014 (Prov. of kerman).

Cymindis ( Eremocymindis ) pallidula Chaudoir, 1846 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kabak, 2003
).

Cymindis ( Iscariotes ) hierichontica hierichontica (Reiche & Saulcy, 1855 ) Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kabak, 2003
).
Citations: 100 km South of Mako (Prov. of West Azarbaijan; Mandl, 1973 ).

Cymindis ( Menas ) miliaris (Fabricius, 1801 ) Citations
: Province Mazandaran (
Chaudoir, 1842
).

= hyrcana
Tschitschérine, 1896
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Damavand Mt. Gosfand Sara (Prov. of Tehran), 10 km West of Pol Sefid, 870 m (Prov. of Mazandaran).
